alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buchanan County through 345 PM CDT... At 321 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elk Run Heights, or 8 miles northeast of Waterloo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairbank around 340 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
